text:
- [Narrator] AWS Graviton4
is the latest, most powerful

and energy efficient
processor we've ever designed

for a broad range of workloads
running on Amazon EC2.

It provides 50% more cores
and 75% more memory bandwidth
compared to Graviton3.
Discover the benefits of Graviton4
with Amazon EC2 R8g instances,
ideal for memory intensive workloads.
They have up to 30% better performance

and larger instance sizes
for scale up workloads.
Offering three times more vCPUs in memory
than Graviton3 based R7g instances.
ClickHouse House tested R8g instances

on its serverless real-time
data warehouse product

and saw an up to 20%
better price-performance.

Quiver, a subsidiary
of Recruit Co Limited,
saw its database for educational services

gain up to two times
better price-performance

with R8g instances when
compared to Graviton2-based
R6g instances.

SmugMug achieved an up to
40% performance improvement
over Graviton3 based R7g instances
in image and data compression workloads.

Join these customers and try
Amazon EC2 R8g instances today.
(upbeat music)
